Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Yaiza (Playa Blanca), HL Club Playa Blanca Hotel is convenient to Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen and Playa Dorada. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Marina Rubicon and Papagayo Beach.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 164 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchens with refrigerators and microwaves. Rooms have private patios. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools or enjoy other recreational amenities including a nightclub and bicycles to rent. This apartment also features wireless Internet access (surcharge), babysitting/childcare (surcharge), and supervised childcare/activities.

Dining
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of HL Club Playa Blanca Hotel. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a 24-hour front desk, and multilingual staff. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is noon
All-inclusive rates are available at this apartment. Meals and beverages at onsite dining establishments are included in all-inclusive rates. Charges may be applied for dining at some restaurants, special dinners and dishes, some beverages, and other amenities.

Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of HL Club Playa Blanca Hotel. While enjoying a refreshing dip in the apartment pool, you can order your favorite drink at the poolside bar.


Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Yaiza (Playa Blanca), HL Club Playa Blanca Hotel is convenient to Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen and Playa Dorada. This 4-star apartment is within the vicinity of Marina Rubicon and Papagayo Beach.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Plaza Nuestra Senora del Carmen - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Playa Dorada - 1.3 km / 0.8 mi
Marina Rubicon - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Papagayo Beach - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
Los Hervideros Caves - 9.6 km / 6 mi
Quemada Beach - 10.8 km / 6.7 mi
Whale and Dolphin Museum - 14 km / 8.7 mi
Playa Las Agujas - 15.8 km / 9.8 mi
Timanfaya National Park - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi
Corralejo Dunes Natural Park - 17.4 km / 10.8 mi
Puerto del Carmen Beach - 17.7 km / 11 mi
Corralejo Beach - 18.4 km / 11.4 mi
Lanzarote Golf Resort - 19.3 km / 12 mi
Rancho Texas Park - 19.7 km / 12.2 mi
Pocillos Beach - 20.6 km / 12.8 mi

The preferred airport for HL Club Playa Blanca Hotel is Arrecife (ACE-Lanzarote) - 23.8 km / 14.8 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
